Starscream

Starscream shook his head at Reptillica.

"I'd rather tell Zardus first." He kept flying.
______________________________________________________________________
Brix and Fliq

Fliq felt Ramulus move away from him. He was alone again. He was 
healed on the inside, and was now fully consious. The mech fluid had 
stopped leaking, but there was still a problem: He had no arm. Almost 
as if the thought triggered it, Fliq began to feel an enormus surge 
of energy go throgu his body. He knew what it was. This is the same 
kind of feeling he got when he was inside Brix, and he became the 
centaur. But this one was going a bit different. His arm started to 
regenerate, and when it did he was fine, but other changes occured. 
His fur started to lighten, until it was almost completly white. And 
too cap it off, two massive horns greww out of his head. Fliq had 
become a fuzor. Part fox, part Ram.

Meanwhile, Brix had been watching this, and gaped in magnificance.

"By the Matrix....." Fliq stirred a little, and opened his eyes.

"Hey Brix. How'd it go?"

"You're okay! That's great! How Ramulus doin?"

"Ramulus. That was a weird trick he did. I saw HIS life flash before 
my eyes. Except I didn't have eyes. But I'll ask."

Fliq focus' a message into his body.

Ramulus? You okay buddy?
